page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO OUR BLOCK.
page.content: The block is situated at the south side of a small town,Chorley,within easy reach of a comprehensive motorway system.Our block contains open spaces for farming and recreation. Houses are mixed residential,with some small units for industry and commerce. New building is taking place to replace old houses and shops and update facilities.People within this area take an active part in all aspects of Sport and the Arts.Many interesting people have offered us valuable information,and good use has been made of the local media.Children have explored their locality and are now more aware of the Geography,Ecology and People within their Enviroment.The work that people are employed in and the games children play are all included. Folk customs play a part in our lives,as does a healthy commitment to the various Christian Denominations.
